article_title: Japan commemorates 69 years since Nagasaki atomic bomb
article_text: - Japan remembered the victims of the 1945 atomic bombing of Nagasaki in a memorial service Saturday. 150,000 people died in the attack and from the subsequent radiation sickness. ()
